TEXT.TITLE: ADAMS EXPRESS CO <ADX> SETS REGULAR PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Div 12 cts vs 12 cts Pay April 20 Record April 8 NOTE: company pays dividend of 12 cts three times annually with a bulk payment at the end of the fiscal year to equal annual dividend of 50 cts. Reuter
